text: Hurricane Electric is a global Internet service provider based in Fremont, California. They offer internet transit, network applications, and data center colocation services. According to their own data, they are the largest global IP network in terms of network adjacencies in both IPv4 and IPv6. They operate the largest IPv4 and IPv6 transit networks globally, with a focus on native IPv6 connections. Hurricane Electric also provides an IPv6 tunnel broker service, offering free connectivity to the IPv6 Internet. They have an online IPv6 certification program aimed at promoting education and compliance in IPv6 technology. == References == Category:American telephone companies
title: Hurricane Electric
